There are 835 companies in KYC Solutions which include Onfido, Truework,

Last updated: October 1, 2023

## 1. Onfido

soonicorn

Provider of customer identification and KYC solutions for multiple sectors

Founded Year

2012

Investors

TPG, Salesforce Ventures and 84 Others

Location

London  (United Kingdom)

Tracxn Score

71/100 What is this?

Stage

Series D

Competitors Rank

1 of 1,102 Competitors

Funding

$242M

Provider of customer identification and KYC solutions for multiple sectors.
Its features include customer onboarding, document authorization, fraud
prevention, and more. It provides verification solutions such as driver
verification for fleet services, age verification, document verification, and
more. It uses AI-based tools for verifying facial biometrics. It offers
solutions to multiple industries including eCommerce and retail, financial
institutions and services, healthcare, transport, and online gaming.

## 2. Truework

soonicorn

Candidate background verification solution

Founded Year

2017

Investors

Sequoia Capital, Menlo Ventures and 25 Others

Location

San Francisco  (United States)

Tracxn Score

70/100 What is this?

Stage

Series C

Competitors Rank

4 of 1,224 Competitors

Funding

$119M

Truework provides a candidate background verification solution to businesses.
Allows users to automate the verification process & verify information like
employment and income. Also conducts background checks during loan
applications and home purchases. Clients include Trunk Club, The Motley Fool,
InsideSales.com, and more.

## 3. Perfios

soonicorn

Real-time credit-decisioning platform and data aggregation APIs

Founded Year

2007

Investors

Bessemer Venture Partners, Warburg Pincus and 31 Others

Location

Bengaluru  (India)

Tracxn Score

69/100 What is this?

Stage

Series D

Competitors Rank

7 of 1,673 Competitors

Funding

$384M

Real-time credit-decisioning platform and data aggregation APIs. It provides
users with a SaaS-based B2B fintech software company in India that provides
financial data analysis software and tools, as well as SME lending solutions.
It also offers information on the financial worthiness of the customer and
automates the loan decision process. Its APIs help companies to create
personal finance applications for consumers. It also provides a personal
finance manager application to manage finance in one place with embedded
finance, KYC, and more.

## 4. IDnow

soonicorn

Developer of KYC, identity verification, and AML solutions for banks and
financial institutions

Founded Year

2014

Investors

BlackRock, European Investment Bank and 9 Others

Location

Munich  (Germany)

Tracxn Score

69/100 What is this?

Stage

Series C

Competitors Rank

5 of 1,102 Competitors

Funding

$40M

Developer of KYC, identity verification, and AML solutions for banks and
financial institutions. Its products include AutoIdent for AI-based identity
verification, VideoIdent for video-based verification, BankIdent for identity
verification via bank transfers, and more. It provides solutions for
transaction monitoring, customer onboarding, identity and document
verification, and more. Industries using the solutions include gaming,
esports, cryptocurrency, insurance, finance, and more.

## 5. IDfy

soonicorn

Online platform for identity verification

Founded Year

2011

Investors

New Enterprise Associates, HDFC Bank and 33 Others

Location

Mumbai  (India)

Tracxn Score

68/100 What is this?

Stage

Series D

Competitors Rank

7 of 1,374 Competitors

Funding

$21M

Online platform for applicant tracking. The platform offers tools for customer
verifications, employee verifications, user verifications, partner
verification, etc. . The solutions include KYC, AML, GDPR compliance, customer
onboarding, identity authentication, video KYC, face validation, and more. It
offers data science and AI-based fraud detection solutions. It caters to
solutions for banks, financial services, recruiters, insurers, and more.

## 6. Digio

minicorn

Platform offering API-enabled digital KYC and documentation solutions for
banks and enterprises

Founded Year

2016

Investors

Rainmatter Technology, Groww and 4 Others

Location

Bengaluru  (India)

Tracxn Score

67/100 What is this?

Stage

Seed

Competitors Rank

14 of 4,314 Competitors

Funding

$11.9M

Platform offering API-enabled digital KYC and documentation solutions for
banks and enterprises. It automates the process of digital signing, digital
KYC, document collection, digitization, identity linking, and more.
E-signature is being done by Aadhaar number which is linked to the account of
the user and, KYC and onboarding are done through video in-person
verification, ID card analysis, Aadhaar verification, and Digi locker
integration. It also automates document collection and flows, and recurring
payments collection.

## 7. Id-Pal

Provider of an online platform for identity verification

Founded Year

2016

Investors

Startupbootcamp, Act Venture Capital and 15 Others

Location

Dublin  (Ireland)

Tracxn Score

66/100 What is this?

Stage

Series A

Competitors Rank

10 of 1,144 Competitors

Funding

$8.84M

Provider of an online platform for identity verification. It allows the user
to send a link to the clients whose identity needs to be verified. The app
facilitates clients to upload their documents via smartphone, takes up a suite
of ID V checks, and compiles a single-page verification report.

## 8. HyperVerge

minicorn

Provider of a deep-learning technology product for image verification

Founded Year

2014

Investors

New Enterprise Associates, IKP Knowledge Park and 7 Others

Location

Bengaluru  (India)

Tracxn Score

65/100 What is this?

Stage

Seed

Competitors Rank

12 of 2,472 Competitors

Funding

$1M

Provider of a deep-learning technology product for image verification. It
provides users with a platform for digital KYC+, dedupe fraud checks, data
verification, credit scoring, and contract verification solutions. It also
offers a platform that takes satellite or other map data for identifying
objects and detecting changes and it converts petabytes of data into
actionable insights. It has use cases in financial services, telecom, energy,
security, and defence applications.

## 9. Sumsub

minicorn

Cloud and AI-based KYC and AML compliance solutions

Founded Year

2015

Investors

Flint Capital, UCP Investment Group and 9 Others

Location

London  (United Kingdom)

Tracxn Score

64/100 What is this?

Stage

Series A

Competitors Rank

24 of 1,635 Competitors

Funding

$7.5M

Cloud and AI-based KYC and AML compliance solutions. It provides solutions for
customer onboarding, document verification, identity verification, AML
screening, and more. It uses AI-based tools for the inspection of electronic
images of physical documents to identity verification and fraud recognition
solutions. It finds use cases in employee onboarding, online trading,
blockchain-based projects, and the on-demand economy.

## 10. Trust Stamp

Artificial intelligence-based biometric identity and KYC solutions

Founded Year

2016

Investors

Plug and Play Tech Center, REACH and 19 Others

Location

Atlanta  (United States)

Tracxn Score

64/100 What is this?

Stage

Public

Competitors Rank

19 of 3,293 Competitors

Funding

$9.18M

Artificial intelligence-based biometric identity and KYC solutions. It enables
organizations to protect users through AI-powered identity solutions developed
at the intersection of biometrics, privacy, and cybersecurity. It transforms
sensitive data to maximize both its privacy and utility, allowing businesses
to adopt biometrics and other anti-fraud initiatives while protecting personal
information from hacks and leaks. It also authenticates users by applying
multiple proofs of liveliness and attack detection techniques to a still image
or video.

## Company profile of PRICE

### What does PRICE do?

Cloud-based predictive cost analytics software for government contractors. It
provides various tools for budgeting & planning, program management, etc. It
also offers cost estimation software for commercial companies. It provides
industrial reports for the bidding and schedule estimation process.

### What sectors and market segments does PRICE operate in?

PRICE serves in the B2B, SaaS space in the FinTech market segments.
